name: Nurse Demon
description:
Summary

A game made for the Completion Jam, where the theme was "Out of Place".

When Af loses a bet with a fellow demon, she must endure a shift volunteering at a children's health clinic as punishment. She's out of place trying to help take care of the kids while the doctor performs the checkups, but a bet is a bet and a demon stays true to her word.

Move with WASD and pick up objects with the Spacebar. The children in the check up rooms will need various things while they wait, indicated by a thought bubble above their heads. If you pick up the wrong object, you can get rid of it by tossing it into the Portal to Hell by the Toy Chest.

Though the Completion Jam is about trying to complete a game project, the usual difficulties of a jam occurred. The game features opening and closing dialogue and a functional level. We hoped to accomplish additional levels and further dialogue scenes. Expected playtime ~5 minutes.

Thank you for playing!
